name: Cloning
description: replace random mod with exact copy of another random mod. Item must be chosen first.

name: Scourging
description: add random negative mod, then min equivalent-value positive mod.

name: Combination
description: the mods of 2 chosen items are randomly distributed across the 2 items, ignoring base limitations. each item then gains 1 random mod. Items must be chosen first.

name: Fate
description: reroll a random mod. Item must be chosen first.

name: Empowerment
description: randomly apply 1 upgrade point; if impossible, adds new random mod. Item must be chosen first.

name: Attunement
description: Turn any non-relic into a relic, dynamically building thematic affixes as needed

name: Learning
description: Instantly level one of your relic slots or one of your attuned items; reroll if none in party

name: Negation
description: Random mod is negated, resultant points are distributed randomly. Item must be chosen first.

name: Brittleness
description: body armour gets -1 AC and random hard-tripled enchant
